name: Parmesan Sauteed Mushrooms
description: Creamy delectable mushrooms, a great hearty meat substitute.
steps: 1) Preheat a large skillet over medium heat, add the oil and butter and allow the butter to melt and the mixture get hot. Add the mushrooms and thyme, saute for about 8 to 10 minutes or until they begin to slump down a bit a develop some good color.
2) Add the garlic and cook for another 30 seconds, add the water and allow it to reduce a bit for a few seconds.
3) Season with salt and pepper to taste, add the cream, Parmesan and parsley and cook for 1 minute.
